abstract: Mormon Church excommunicates John P Dehlin, founder and host of postcast for Mormons who are questioning their faith, accusing him of apostasy; Dehlin says real reason for his expulsion is his support of same-sex marriage and ordaining of women as priests.
lead_paragraph: The Mormon Church confirmed that John P. Dehlin was expelled, saying he had led members astray by publicly proclaiming his disbelief in Mormon scripture and basic doctrines.

headline.print_headline: Mormon Church Votes to Expel Critic
headline.seo: John Dehlin Says He Was Ousted for Backing Gay Marriage and Gender Equality

snippet: The Mormon Church confirmed that John P. Dehlin was expelled, saying he had led members astray by publicly proclaiming his disbelief in Mormon scripture and basic doctrines.
